description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              1) Direct and coordinate activities of businesses or departments concerned between Finance, HR, Supply Chain, shipping, Warehouse, Customer service.
              
              2) Manage staff,  Coordinating with management at head office for any step in follow ups for direct reports assigning duties.
              
              3) In conjunction with corporate HR & Vietnam HR, Establish and implement departmental policies, goals, objectives, and procedures.
              
              4) Determine staffing requirements, and interview, hire and train new employees, or oversee those personnel processes.
              
              5) Monitor agencies to ensure that they efficiently and effectively provide needed services.
              
              6) In conjunction with Corporate HR Implement & coordinate employee Quarterly training for best business practices, new policies, etc.
              
              7) Manage the movement of goods into and out of production facilities.
              
              8) Develop and implement strategies to improve office operations.
              
              9) Plan and direct activities for office Management.
              
              10) Improve employee and client retention rates through active communication and problem-solving efforts
              
              11) Establish team atmosphere through leadership and employee development
              
              12) Manage employee schedules and troubleshoot scheduling conflicts as they arise
              
              13) Continuing education in management, organization, and team-building skills
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              • Candidates in Asian countries are an advantage
              
              • A background working in the same position at least 5 years
              
              • Bachelor's degree or equivalent
              
              • knowledge of business and management principles and practices
              
              • knowledge of strategic planning
              
              • knowledge of human resource management principles and procedures
              
              • knowledge of basic economic and accounting principles and practices
              
              • Knowledge of Warehouse, Shipping, Customer service, Supply Chain
              
              • Very good communication skills in English.
              
              • Proven team leadership capability and people development.
              
              • All nationalities are welcome - Candidates in Asian countries are an advantage
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
